name: 3D Classics: Kirby's Adventure
synopsis: 3D Classics: Kirby's Adventure offers you a chance to explore the world of Dream Land in a whole new way! The landscape comes to life as Kirbyâ„¢ crosses land, sea, and sky in his quest to restore the Star Rod!
